recipesJson.name: Orangsicle . DEAD SIMPLE
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: This is a blood orange creamsicle, nothing more or less. Made for the DEAD SIMPLE recipe series.

reviews.text: Excellent. It tastes just like an orange dream bar after an over night steep. Of the shake, I could really taste the blood orange, but by mid day the next day....yes sir.
I substituted FW VBIC at the same percentage, because I didn’t have FA Vanilla  Ice Cream and added .25% Ws-23 and it’s really close to Mad Hatter’s 120 Pop.
